website_summaries.verdict: This compact bag is a sturdy, easy-to-clean pick for essentials. Just watch how you open the exterior pockets when it's hanging.
pros: Large enough for a few days' essentials
Polyester exterior stands up to bathroom spills
Large inner compartment divided with mesh
cons: Exterior zippers are designed so items can fall out when hung

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag!  Get glass suction cup to hang it on bathroom mirror.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag. I love all the compartments which makes it real easy to stay organized and know when I'm missing something. I also purchased a 3" glass suction cup to take with me when I travel. Now when I'm in a hotel, I can hang this bag from the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Todd B

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Room!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one like the LLBean product. I would say this was pretty close, and a great price!! We were able to fit a lot in here. Works well for couples, would need multiple if it's for a family. Very sturdy, will last for a long time. Thanks Amazon for this great quality product at an awesome price!! PS I had already taken out our razors and toothbrushes, which had been in the right side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: offFAM

customer_reviews.title: Coulda been a contender
customer_reviews.text: Good kit. Good materials. Nice price. One obvious design mistake: the outside zippers to start at the bottom not the top. Fix this and this is a five-star item. Don't fix it, and stuff drops out every time you open the zipper with the bag hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: An essential for traveling
customer_reviews.text: The design of this toiletry kit is incredibly thoughtful. Everything from the internal lining to the durable 1680D polyester outer layer makes my vacation trips much more manageable. All the pockets are very well laid out and can hold all your toiletry essentials while maintaining a compact size. The hanger is the cherry on top. Adding this functionality makes it easy to put the kit in different places without taking to much counter space in the bathroom. Highly recommended if you want to organize your toiletries for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: HandsON

customer_reviews.title: Compact and useful
customer_reviews.text: AmazonBasics offered this basic but decently constructed HANGING TOILETRY KIT. The unit, about the size of a purse, zips open into two sections, with a built-in hanger to hang it in a hotel bathroom or anywhere else, two side pockets that zip open, and a waterproof compartment at the bottom of the main section. If you are new to this kind of travel "bag," do not expect instructions. Made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Allen SmallingTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: Very good toiletry kit
customer_reviews.text: The toiletry kit I bought from Amazon looks and feels high quality. The zippers are strong and function smoothly. I have been using it for the last month and it has served me very well. I don't find anything negative about the kit. It seems to be doing what it's made for. It has ample space to hold all my items. As seen from the pictures, I have even more space for more items.
customer_reviews.author: Kanchan J

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: My own fault for not reading the measurements. We have one very similar that we love and it was getting old looking, so I ordered this one, since it looked identical. Our old one is much taller. This one is very short. You can't fit a hairbrush standing up. My electric toothbrush doesn't even stand up in it. I typically use regular size bottles of shampoo and shaving cream. Can't stand them up either. I tried to return it, but it was only $11 and the return fee is $5.99. Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: L.G.

customer_reviews.title: Way too Small but appears well made. Would return but return shipping is HIGH!
customer_reviews.text: If you are going on an overnight trip this might work. If you are going on an extended business trip or vacation then this bag is WAY TOO SMALL!!! Too bad as it looks to be well made and functional. I have two other Amazon Basic bags a computer and garment bag both are well made and nice. This is just too small to be useful on my extended business trips. Was going to return due to size then Amazon wants $6 to return a $15 bag. That seems to be a RIP OFF! Donating to Goodwill for the tax write off. Really Amazon $6 to return?
customer_reviews.author: PGA

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, but hook should swivel 90 degrees
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this bag seems great. I'd give 5 stars except for one issue. My one complaint is that the hook should swivel 90 degrees so it can sit flush. Typically when I travel, I would hook this over the shower door or a towel bar. But, since there is no ability for swivel, the hook is parallel to whatever you are trying to hang it on. You can twist it a bit, but that makes the fabric go a little twisted and I would think that after awhile it will wear the bag down unnecessarily.
customer_reviews.author: AstroJoy

customer_reviews.title: Makes traveling easier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toiletry kit!! If you're looking for something not too large and not too small to fit your basic toiletries, this is the bag for you. It has a lot of usable compartments and pockets, and the fact that it hangs up is a bonus. Although this is one of the cheaper hanging toiletry kits you can buy, that price is not reflected in the quality. I'm very happy with this purchase! In the picture, I put a saline solution bottle in it to give a size reference.
customer_reviews.author: Cami Spackman

customer_reviews.title: Too big & heavy for me, side bag zipper design wrong
customer_reviews.text: This case was too large and heavy for my needs. The material is top quality, very sturdy, but I prefer lighter weight for something that travels inside my suitcase. As others have noted, the side compartments zippers are designed wrong. When closed, the zippers are at the bottom, and as they are opened upward, items can slip out. If they closed with the zippers on the other end, they could be unzipped from the top down, and only part way if users wanted to prevent items from falling out. I sent this back and ended up getting  I'll add a review there, but to summarize, it's smaller. lighter and very conveniently designed.
customer_reviews.author: Techgineer

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly i my overnight/carry on bag and hold everything I need. Fits a full size toothbrush as well as five travel size shampoos, two travel tooth pastes, two travel size lotions, four disposable razors, dental floss, two full size bar soaps, Q tips, and much more. Has a convenient hook for hanging, if the bathroom you are in will allow for it, and I like the way it unfolds to hang. I've had mine for months and used it quite a lot for back and forth travel, but it shows absolutely no sign on wear and tear to date. Very sturdy and holds everything I need in the limited space I have to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C Dubey

customer_reviews.title: It's a good idea, well made but poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case I could hang or use on the counter top. The outer side pockets are lame in that the zipper opens from the bottom so when it's hanging everything falls out as soon as you start to unzip it. I guess that makes it easy to find stuff when it's laying all over the counter or floor. The side pockets also unzip all the way around which is completely unnecessary. Poor design. It's about the right size and has more internal pockets. I'll make it work simply because I haven't found anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a month long trip overseas and it did not disappoint. The bag is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a month long trip overseas and it did not disappoint. The bag is very sturdy and well made. I was traveling with my toddler and was able to pack both of our toiletries for the entire month in it: 8 travel sized bottles as well as full sized skincare products, deodorant and hair products, plus a few smaller items. It made the bag very heavy, but it was able to hold everything.
customer_reviews.author: ReiKoko

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, compact enough yet enough space to hold all my toiletries
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, it has enough space to hold all of my toiletries for a trip and it's made from really good quality material that's sturdy and tough, only issue i had was the design of the zippers on both sides, when you open them they open up against gravity so you can't just open the zippers and leave them open because everything will fall out, if they just redesign it to open from top to bottom you'll be able to keep them half opened, reach your stuff without them falling
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not for Minimalist Packers
customer_reviews.text: I've become a one bag traveler recently. I found a great bag that balances size with weight, but still looking for the best way to pack toiletries. Normally I'd throw my tubes all in a ziplock and be done. Well on my most recent trip we did a lot of moving - nearly every day for two weeks. Per recommendations, I thought a hanging hag would be a great idea. I didn't love this bag - in fact, I left it behind. It just takes up way too much valuable space. I also found when hanging it became unbalanced. Maybe that part was user error. Not the right bag for me. It'd be good in a smaller form.
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price but poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: The zippers on the sides zip the wrong way - you can't open them w/o stuff spilling out while it's hanging. OTOH the main pocket is pretty roomy, so I use the sides for things like toothpaste I'd keep on the counter. It folds up nice, taking up less space in my carry on than my old bag. It works well in my bathroom too, I ended up just keeping my toiletries in it all the time so I can grab it when travelling. For the price, I'm happy, but I wish a little more thought was put into the design, lots of little issues like the zipper thing drop it down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Side pockets zip open from the bottom, things fall out...
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar style bag with side pockets I got overseas, and wanted one like it for a backpacking camp kitchen. Have taken this bag out a couple of times, and when I hang it, then want something out of a side pocket (lighter, spoon, salt/pepper shaker), things tend to fall out when I start to unzip it. If the side compartment zippers closed at the top this would be a great bag. But it is not. Such a seemingly small detail - now change in cost or materials, just thinking through how a bag that is hanging up works.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for weekend flights and hotel stays
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple and compact bag, but there's a lot of space inside, and the space is organized very nicely. I've used it on overnight road-trips and weekend trips via plane, and it has done me well. Being an AmazonBasics item, it's not ultra high quality material or anything, but for the price is outstanding. My only complaint is that it doesn't stand freely like some cosmetics bags do, but those types don't offer nearly the space or organization that this one does. This one is definitely designed to be hung in your hotel bathroom, and it fulfills that purpose very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and left my favorite toiletry bag in a hotel (RIP). So after trying a bunch, I ended up with this one and I love it. It's got a few compartments (I use one for toothpaste, brush, and floss, and the other side for travel shampoo). It hangs or sits, and I find it works much better sitting on the bathroom counter. Plus, less chance of forgetting it 😄
customer_reviews.author: Scott Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Not what I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have mentioned - the side pockets zip the wrong way. I've used it on one trip and I could not keep items in the sides and use them - I had to remove them and keep them on the counter because they were always falling out. Also, the main compartment is just one cavernous cave and everything tips over and is a mess. I had a similar bag that was stolen and I'd thought this would be a great replacement. My old bag took up less space and yet held them same amount of stuff. The side zippers need to be reversed and the main compartment needs more organization.
customer_reviews.author: MamaQuail

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after first use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag based on the great reviews only to have it rip completely after the first use. I scuba dive often meaning I jump in and out of boats with my gear and personal items so I really needed something to protect my important stuff. The material is a definitely thinner than other dry bags i've used in the past so when i filled it with my stuff, the lining where you fold just completely ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too big but yet has no room to fit items
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be slightly larger than my current toiletry bag which is falling apart. Turns out, this bag is huge and yet there really is not a lot of space in the pockets on the sides or in the front and rear. You basically get a big pocket in the middle that everything will comingle. I will be looking for something different. Without free return shipping, it was half the price to send it back...not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: They work. The cap clips into the lens and they are very secure. That is what I was looking for most. I also wanted a lens cap that was tied to the tether and this lens cap meets that requirement. But, like others have mentioned the braiding does pull back from the monofilament line that is the core of the tether. Once you bend the monofilament line tight enough to get it through the hole it doesn't straighten out and sticks out of the braiding. I don't think this will compromise the tether, but they could of used a good braided cord for the tether and not had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Practical Toiletry kit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to take on a 3 month trip to Europe and it worked great. I always carry way too many toiletries and this bag held everything (travel sized bottles). It has several options/pockets to store smaller items such as bandaids, hair clips, nail clippers etc. While my suitcase was pretty full, this kit always fit nicely at the front of my bad. It was just the right height to stand up in a medium sized soft suit case. The zippers are sturdy and easy to maneuver. The long side pockets are great for a hair brush on one side and a tooth brush on the other. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: amy king

customer_reviews.title: Great Medium Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Hello, for you gents looking for carry your small but convenient items this is the bag for your. My wife has a large bag similar to this. I was used to having a small 5x7 bag that the military would issue...now that things have changed and I travel more, the more items I need to take with me. This is the bag, and not just for ladies, I would hope anyone searching for the right-size travel bag try this one. About the only thing I recommend is using a snack-zip-lock bag for Q-tips, and extra floss & toothpaste in another, everything else stands up-right.
customer_reviews.author: A.C.E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Kit for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought his because I travel every week and for the money it’s the best one out there as far as I’m concerned. I got sick of having to dump everything out of my old one in order to find anything. This toiletry kit organizes everything so there’s no digging! The material is also very durable and I’ve overstuffed mine without any issues. The built in hook is an added bonus and really helps to keep the vanity clutter down. I’ve been very impressed with the Amazon Basics products I’ve bought and this one is no exception!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Light, sturdy, and intelligently designed.  I bought a second one for family.
customer_reviews.text: Whoever designed this clearly has done some traveling. It fits in backpack. There are compartments of every size, some are water resistant some on the outside. I use the outside for power bars and the other side for toothbrush. Inside we have a clean space for tips and small things, and a larger space inside for shower bottles, which can be kept in a ziplock inside this. It has a hangar for keeping it off the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toiletry bag is great!
customer_reviews.text: Another great AmazonBasics product. I love this, and will be using it to go to the beach in a few days. Travel size bottles fit with ease, and you definitely could bring bigger bottle sizes if you want. There's also a few little pockets and its hangable.
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: My older son is in Boy Scouts now so he'll ...
customer_reviews.text: My older son is in Boy Scouts now so he'll be going on camping trips on his own. I have a different brand of this and figured I'd order a second for times when we have separate camping trips to go on. This AmazonBasics bag is a bit larger than the other brand I have and seems just as durable. It's got tons of spots inside for separating various items, plus a few outside pockets for other stuff.
customer_reviews.author: George Jaros

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It fits a lot of stuff. I do a lot of weekend trips so I just keep this thing loaded up. Pretty sturdy and I'll update if it goes all cheapo china on me and falls apart. If the zippers on the sides opened another way that'd be cool but it's a small beef. Sometimes stuff falls out. I also wish the wet pocket would be bigger. I keep a bar of soap in there and it can't fit much else
customer_reviews.author: SDyee

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Basics has done it again. this bag is pretty durable and made of a good quality while being very affordable. It has lots of space and pockets to store all those travel size toiletry items. For a guy, this way too much space and big but because if that i start adding extra stuff in it to fill in the gap like body spray and first aid kits and more. You pretty much will not be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, but fits a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I loved that there were compartments inside the bag to sort the toiletries. You can definitely cram a lot of stuff in here, and it's nice being able to hang it up inside your hotel room. It is also water-resistant, and had multiple layers of waterproofing inside. Despite getting this wet pretty often, no smells or mold developed. However, because of the material, the bag is bulky. This is great for: regular travelling with a suitcase. I would not recommend this for: backpacking, camping
customer_reviews.author: Connie Z

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The best part is the compartments and lots of space. I fit in there everything that I could imagine with room to spare. However, my only gripe is that it's actually too big. So when you hang it on the back of the door, it kind of flops a little. Nothing terrible, but I've had others toiletry bags that were just the right size. It's my own preference. If it was any more expensive I would have given it 4 stars. The price to value ratio is terrific.
customer_reviews.author: JoeBob

customer_reviews.title: The best toiletry bag I've ever had trouble using
customer_reviews.text: This bag is made really well, but I'm having difficulty handling it, getting it open/closed, and just using it in general unless it's hanging up, then it's really great. I wish it opened differently, maybe add a top zipper to access when not hanging. The materials are the best and so is the construction and zippers. It's just plain clumsy to handle and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lake_lj

customer_reviews.title: Far smaller than it appears. Useless.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to tell just how small these bags are until you are holding one. The size makes it worthless to me. I am taking a 2-3 month road trip and need a LARGE toiletry bag. This term seems to fall upon deaf ears within Amazon's search as this was returned as one of the options. Useless and I'm annoyed as I'm under a time crunch. Wasted my d**n time ordering this pathetic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a well constructed item, but it is a lot smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I landed on this toiletry bag after trying and returning some fancier leather travel bags. I like the size of this bag and the layout. When I unzip it not only do I have the space I need, but the pockets are laid out in such a way that it's easy to find what I'm looking for. The zippers are well built and feel sturdy. I would recommend this bag without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: If you travel often, this handy bag is a must. You can store all your toiletries very compactly. There are several pockets inside and outside to keep things organized. When you reach your destination you can just unzip the bag and hang it on a hook in the bathroom. I’m extremely pleased with my purchase and have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: AshKum

customer_reviews.title: Good for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this for a trip to Europe to stash my makeup collection (well not the ENTIRE collection). It worked well with what I needed fitting in almost perfectly. I don't think I could use it for toiletries because it's not the largest bag, but for some it might work that way. I liked that there was netting and some zippered sections inside to put certain things in an accessible fashion. The only complaint I have about this bag is the single handle it has. It's pretty awkward when holding and I think it should have 2 handles like most other things.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, terrible design!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to love this Hanging Toiletry Kit--just the right size and spots to keep things separate. . . That is until I used it for the first time! When the kit is hanging, if you zip open the side compartments, everything falls out! The zippers should have been designed so they start at the top!!! DUH!!!! That way, I can peek/reach in the side compartments without losing everything.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bag. It's big enough to fit all of my stuff but still small enough I can put it in my gym bag. The pockets make it easy to keep things organized and find what I need quickly. It replaces a bag that was just a single compartment and I like this one much better. I've been using it for a month now and it isn't showing any signs of wear so it looks like it should hold up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wakley

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was buying a toiletries bag, got a carry on luggage
customer_reviews.text: Huge--seriously. I thought I was buying something to replace my toiletries kit for flying, but this would take up the majority of my carry on. Maybe it is useful if you always fly with checked luggage. I could put all of my full-sized toiletries--ALL OF THEM--and not fill this thing. Has anyone heard of travel sized containers? Maybe this will replace my locker room toiletries bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Steger

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has more room than I was expecting. I'm able to fit everything my husband and I need for quick trips. I keep this in the closet with an extra set of our full-size toiletries so that I don't have to pull everything out of the bathroom every time we take a quick trip. It saves us the hassle of having to pack and unpack everything once a week, so it's totally worth it. The attached hook is a nice touch, and allows you to access the contents of the bag easily.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, solid travel bag
customer_reviews.text: An excellent addition to my gym bag. This bag is firm and sturdy while being able to air out the things that get wet while in the shower. I would recommend this for any place you would use your grooming supplies.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works well - a little larger than I thought....
customer_reviews.text: It's large and while it fits full sized bottles of shampoo and lotion, it is heavy. Once stocked, if the zippered front is left open and you attempt to hang it from the carrying handle, the contents can spill out. The hook is slightly undersized - not for the weight - but for the size of the hooks at my gym. Pros: Fits lots of product Carries my travel blow dryer Side pockets are useful for things like my swimming goggles Cons: Fits too much product and can be heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mpls Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great value for this hanging cosmetic bag.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new bag. He recently converted to this hanging style of hanging dop bag after more than 50 years. His first one was an inexpensive one which quickly ripped. When this one came he got out all of his travel cosmetics and he was pleasantly surprised to see how they fit. Being the engineer that he is, he attached a piece Velcro at the top area so things would not slip out when he folded the top over and zipped it. 3 full weeks of travel and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the opportunity to fly w/ it yet, but the bag is really functional. It has lots of pockets and room (though I feel like a pack rat b/c I've already max'ed it out. It replaced a more traditional, counter-style bag, so the ability to let it hang is a nice feature because it saves counter space.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me, some may want larger if you need to carry full size bottles of any kind. Easily holds all the travle size things you'd want, and I usually have 1 full size body wash too. Bought to be my "after workout shower" bag but it didn't take long for this to be the one I take when travelling too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: SMW

customer_reviews.title: Items fall out of end pockets
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 6 star bag for me if the end zippers went the other direction. As it is designed, when the bag is hung and I unzip the two end pockets everything falls out because the bag tips forward (due to weight in it). If the zippers would zip from the top instead of the bottom it would solve thi problem. Or if it was a double zipper on each end that you could zip up or down that would be even better. I keep my glasses in one and and toothbrush/past in the other. Neither are items you want falling on the ground when traveling - or elsewhwere for that matter!
customer_reviews.author: 44fancy

customer_reviews.title: Great design, Very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of nooks and crannies to hold items upright. Hangs on a towel rack and keeps everything handy. Side pockets hold hairbrush, toothbrush, and bottles. My only "complaint" is that the topmost pocket is open (mainly for storing the hook) and is wasted space in my opinion since whatever you put in it will fall out as you are trying to zip it up. It holds a LOT of stuff, but fits into a backpack easily.
customer_reviews.author: Moviequeen

customer_reviews.title: It does not stand when set on a counter. Other than that it's good.
customer_reviews.text: The interior, construction, and capacity are exactly what I hoped for but it does not stand up. By that I mean if you try to set it on a counter the way it is pictured it falls over. It has a round bottom like the top. I assume it is only meant to hang. If your intension is to hand g it I think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: ETGary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel. Sleek design and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect size for my husband for when we travel and there is limited counter top space in which to get ready. He can fit his electric razor & charger, electric toothbrush & charger, colognes, deodorant, q tips, mouthwash, toothpaste, floss, etc. with room to spare! Definite upgrade from him packing all his toiletries in multiple zip locks! Stitching, mesh pockets, and metal hook for hanging are all top quality! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the gym or travel!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how small the bag is and yet spacious enough to put all your toiletry items inside. I go to the gym and it's nice to have everything you need when taking a shower (brushing teeth, shaving, etc.) There are only zippers to open the compartments so it's well designed. When you open the main compartment there is a hook at the flap so you can attach it on another hook or at the stem of the shower head. While I don't recommend submerging it in water, a few splashes here and there wouldn't ruin the material. The product is pretty cheap but it's well made. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I lived out of my backpack while abroad for 2 years. I used this every day for 2 years. I had a couple spills (shampoo) inside of it that were contained. The netting ripped in a couple locations. For the amount of use it got, I'd say it stood up pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Much needed for people who travel frequently
customer_reviews.text: Just loved this product. I ordered this product for our trip which was 5 days and this product was much useful during our trip. Material: material quality is really good and well built. Partitions: It has got perfect partitions for keeping toothpaste, brushes, shampoo, deo, body wash, face wash etc It has got a hanging hook which is very handy to hang and use it. Using this hook it can be hanged on curtain rod of bath tub and use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bharani Kothareddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tolietry Kit
customer_reviews.text: This bag is study. It's quality. The zippers don't feel dinky and like they will break off. They've got some bite and heft to them. This bag has great pockets which offers for great organization. Separation is important when traveling with the different toiletry items. This bag offers that. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: 00ceven

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful bag, excellent industry, contains many places and is very very suitable. The shaver, scissors, and comb were put in. Shower tools included soap, shampoo, creams, perfumes, toothpaste, eye drops, comb and other things, and there is still a place for other things. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Al Badwawi

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: overall i'm pretty happy with this, especially as it's a huge improvement over the last thing I was using. my only complaint is something I saw in someone else's review before I bought it: the side compartments seem like they should unzip in the opposite direction to keep items from falling out when it's hanging. oh well, still happy with the purchase though
customer_reviews.author: Ross W.

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot both personally and professionally and this is hands-down the best toiletry bag I’ve ever owned. It’s sturdy, yet not too stiff where you cannot pack it in and smash it down to make the best use of space. I will buy a few more for backup because it’s THAT good. Also, you can’t beat the price. Plenty of space and water proof fabric inside for spills.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, Great Gift, excellent for traveling and staying organized
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bag! Great way to travel and stay organized. I’ve used this for countless road trips, vacations, and going to the gym on a daily basis. * Very spacious * Lots of pockets * Durable * No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Mark Moncayo

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics Toiletry Kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit is adequate. I just did a two week travel/field test, and it worked pretty well. I do suggest Amazon re-design the direction of the zippers on the side pockets. The way they are set up, when the bag is hanging open, the stuff in the side pockets falls out. If the zipper direction were reversed, you could have them sufficiently open and contents would be accessible without this problem. 2nd review submitted. Where is it? Nee to refund defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it fits everything so nicely and it organizes well. I have bought a couple of these from another company but this was just as good and has a better price point. I did have a incident happen where my entire shampoo bottle exploded in the bag and it cleaned up so easily and nicely, It didn't leave any spots or residue. I am a frequent traveler and really recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lee

customer_reviews.title: Lives in my car for emergency travel
customer_reviews.text: I like this hanging travel organizer. It holds all the things that I need. i do wish the exterior side pockets zipped in the opposite direction, or had elastic inside to hold items in place. Everytime i unzip those pockets, items fall out and several things have broken :( The overall design of the main portion is great and I've sorted everything out.
customer_reviews.author: Addi

customer_reviews.title: Ended up returning
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not tall enough to stand up bottles of shampoo. Just a regular sized bottle of pantene is too tall. You have to lay everything down which kinda defeats the purpose. We ended up returning because it made no sense to have a toiletry bag that you couldn't keep organized. The L.L. Bean bags are far superior to this toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: GReeve

customer_reviews.title: Great reasonably priced Toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I travel a lot and have worn out a couple of cheaper brands. This is really well built for the price. Two zipper tabs is great. I love the two side zipper compartments. I put my toothbrush and toothpaste on the one side pocket and pills I have to take at bedtime in the other one and when I have a red eye flight it is very convenient to grab those if I want to take my pills and brush my teeth at the airport before my red eye flight. Nice size. Fits nicely horizontally at the top of my roller bag. Hangs up nicely in a hotel bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks, more convenient than you’d think
customer_reviews.text: This is larger than it appears in the photos and that’s actually a good thing. Well-constructed with sturdy zippers, this carries all the toiletries you and your family should need for up to a week. Handy zippered side compartments for electric toothbrushes are a nice touch and the internal hook for hanging off towel racks or other places makes it a keeper. BUY THIS - you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Sosai X

customer_reviews.title: Side Compartment Zippers Are Installed Backwards
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a major design flaw: items will fall out of the side compartments when the bag is hanging due to the way the zipper are installed on the side compartments. A double zipper would correct this problem. Alternatively, if each single zipper was installed in the opposite direction this problem is avoided. Still - this bag holds a lot of stuff and is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Da Moogs

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Lots of compartments/pockets. I loved the hanger. Excellent ballistic material. Well fabricated. Great price. My blue complain was the handle. It was off-centered so when I picked the bag by the handle the bag would lean forward. On the up side it was easy for the handle to be tucked under the bag inside the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: CRR

customer_reviews.title: Not well designed, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's fine -- it holds things. The pocket that runs down the entire flap will dump everything out if you're not careful when zipping the main compartment, and due to the shape of the side pockets, they don't hold anything in when unzipped for easy retrieval when it's hanging. Dual zippers or more of a flap on the inside of the zipper would help with this. But, it's basic. So, I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: B R

customer_reviews.title: Great value and solid build
customer_reviews.text: Great build and lots of space. Ideally I wanted something a little smaller, but it travels great. Side pouches and inner mesh and pouches are perfect for all of the different toiletries that I have. Overall for the value this item is tough to beat. Travels with me everywhere now.
customer_reviews.author: RWTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but too big
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this for 3 years, used it frequently, and it's held up extremely well. It still looks new. Its compartments are useful and it fits a lot of items. It's great if you're checking luggage or traveling by car. However, it's bulky and takes up too much room in my carry-on. For that reason alone, I can't give it five stars. I'm looking for a smaller replacement.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have an upcoming 2 week vacation and was in need of a dop bag. After checking the retail stores, where the prices were outrageous in my opinion, I found this bag. I have yet to use it, however, I’ve had similar bags in the past and expect this one to work out really well. Thus I can recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. F. WhiteTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Larger than you would expect.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. Makes it a little hard to pack. Probably would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: FurloughedAgain

customer_reviews.title: Handy travel bag that has already been on three trips and still looks like new!
customer_reviews.text: This actually replaced a much larger bag for my travels. It has cool little pockets inside for stuff that usually ends up on the bottom of other bags. It has a handy mesh compartment that I use for my razor. The side zipper compartments are handy. The only thing I would change would be adding another zipper to each side zip area so you do not have to completely open the compartment to get something out.
customer_reviews.author: Experiment 626

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toiletry Bag for Travel.
customer_reviews.text: This AmazonBasics product is perfect for traveling. It organizes and fits what I need for week long business trips. Glad I found this bag because the offerings at local stores were cheap, flimsy and twice the cost.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Size, Function, Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift. He seems to love it. It's a perfect size and all of the pockets make it very functional. I loved the Lightning Deal price, thanks Amazon! I would recommend this product. It's one of the better ones I've seen on Amazon for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Dess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Fantastic bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are great bags! Bought them for my three sons and son-in-law a couple of years ago. Bought one for my husband this year. They are super sturdy and have lots of room in them! Fantastic quality! Just wish they came in a more feminine color. Bought another brand for my daughter and daughters-in-law this year but not near the quality of these for the same price. You can't go wrong with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.text: The base of this is not very deep which meant I could not fit all of the items I wanted to upright. It is taller than several other items out there but it was wasted space as it wasn't tall enough to stack two travel size bottles on each other. The side pockets might work well for someone but for me I could not figure out what to keep in them.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a spacious bag but when it is closed and held by the handle it bends forward like the strap does not support the weight of the contents. Either the strap should be positioned differently or should be done away with. Because, the way it is now, it is not ergonomically designed.
customer_reviews.author: LB2309Z

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the reviews
customer_reviews.text: As others have pointed out, the zippers on the side pockets are put on the the wrong way. When you use this bag everything in the side pockets tumbles out to the floor. Obviously whoever designed the zippers never actually tried using the bag. If you don't need/use the side pockets, you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: whiterockron

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design - Save your money and time
customer_reviews.text: Who ever designed this with side pocket zippers opening upwards made a terrible error because everything falls right out of side pockets when getting anything else. Not something i am about to deal with for the next few years. Back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is big! It has plenty of room for full size bottles. Plus it has lots of different pockets to keep you organized. I got it to hold a large 4 row x 7 days pill container and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Value Conscious

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics delivered quality for a great price again
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, AmazonBasics delivered quality for a great price again. This is a great bag that is actually pretty roomie. The pockets are great and I love how I am able to store everything in it. I am actually using it at home as it still holds everything I need there too. So the size is actually better than you may think, but that also depends on how much stuff you bring with you. I don't tend to bring a lot of stuff traveling with me and don't have big bottles of shampoo and such. So it is perfect for my needs, but anyone that needs more than the basics, it might get a bit tight with size.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toiletry Kit Bag
customer_reviews.text: Good size toiletry bag. It has many compartments and pockets to store your much needed buttles of shampoo, shaving cream, etc. I really like an ability to hang bag open. Overall sturdy, and should last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you're traveling for extended periods of time this comfortably holds multiple 3oz bottles
customer_reviews.text: When you're traveling for extended periods of time this comfortably holds multiple 3oz bottles, full size tooth paste, toothbrushes, razors, shaving cream, etc. Stuffed it to the max and filled all the pockets, zippers, and sides and still managed to maintain its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than needed. Was looking for something about half this size.
customer_reviews.author: JohnPatrck

customer_reviews.title: It is as advertised, the quality is OK. ...
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised, the quality is OK. Though not quite as large inside as my old non hanging bag it worked OK for a couple of small trips. The only thing it is just a hair too small for my electric tooth brush in it's pouch. I'll probably look for a slight larger one and use this for short trips or my cable and charger collection.
customer_reviews.author: just another customer

customer_reviews.title: This was the best toiletry bag I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This was the best toiletry bag I have ever bought. It's so great. I was able to hang this in the hotel closet (sink was too small to leave it on the sink) and since it was close to the sink it was super convenient. I took the suggestion another user posted about buying a suction cup with it. I haven't used it but I can see where this addition will be so great. Best bag and it fit just about everything I needed (business trip I had to take more than I usually would) and for normal trip this will fit everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee G

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The only change that I might even consider would be to shorten the side pocket zipper opening draw by 2-3 inches. A minor improvement to a near perfect toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: WO

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure I was going to like this design
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I was going to like this design, but I love it. It is a bit bigger than my old kit, so it takes up a little more space in the suitcase, but it is worth it. I bought a rubber suction cup hook, and I hang this bag from the mirror. So far it has worked in over 20 hotels. It is never too heavy to hang from the mirror, and it frees up lots of counter space and keeps my items better organized. It is very well made, great materials and build quality. It looks like it will last for years. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Occam's Razor

customer_reviews.title: Solid budget buy
customer_reviews.text: Using it for college. Decent space and quality. Fits the price.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything in its place and has enough room for my full line of Drunk Elephant skin care, along with travel shampoo, conditioner, body wash, etc. The only thing it doesn't fit is my big electric toothbrush container. The side pockets are nice for small things, and the hook feels metal and secure.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toiletry bag for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Before I purchased this toiletry bag I was skeptical it was going to be cheaply made because of the low price and that it was made by amazon... however I couldn’t have been more pleasantly surprised when I received it. The quality is excellent and the bag was everything I was hoping for. For the very affordable price, you probably cannot find anything better. I enjoyed this bag so much I purchased another one for my work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great but I wish the side pockets zipped down instead ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great but I wish the side pockets zipped down instead of up. My stuff falls out from the bottom as I unzip the pocket. Would be nice to unzip from top and reach my hand in to grab stuff. Don't keep anything small in the sides. However this is a sturdy bag with plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great value for great product
customer_reviews.text: Best unisex travel item for personal hygiene items, accessories, shaving kit, make up -- lots of compartments to organize items -- use it for overnights + longer trips. Highly recommend (also very rugged/durable material).
customer_reviews.author: c0l0rad0red

customer_reviews.title: Best Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: Worldest best toiletry bag. I use this for work all the time. It's made of quality material and will last a long time. Lots of pocket space and compact for your carry on or checked luggage! I've had it for several months with no problems. I like the idea to hang the bag but to be honest there aren't many hotels where I can easily access the bag where it makes sense to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bag with lots of organization options
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toiletry kit. It has a bunch of pockets and pouches to keep things organized - which is more difficult to find in a toiletry bag than you'd think - and it is a nice size. I don't usually keep tons of toiletries, so it is a little large for me, but it is nice to be able to carry full size bottles of your contact solution, etc., if you want to.
customer_reviews.author: Manders

customer_reviews.title: It's held up well. I've used it for long trips and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Hangs well. Many pockets. Zipper is good quality and has never jammed. I've used it twice for one month duration International trips and always been happy with it. I'd definitely buy another if this one ever wears out. I'm sure you could find a better one for five times the price, but why bother?
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Conner

customer_reviews.title: A Great Price for a Super Product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for carrying cosmetics. Used it on a trip to Ireland and it was super! I couldn't believe the quality of this toiletry kit. We have another from a well-known producer, and this one was just as handy and less than half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mormor

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Hanging, Travel Toiletry Bag Organizer, Shower Dopp Kit, Black
feature_bullets: Black toiletry bag designed with an internal lining to easily wipe down leaks and spills
Made with durable 1680D polyester to withstand common bathroom spills
Large main compartment with mesh divide and internal storage spaces; 2 external side compartments
Top hook displays the kit from a shower or towel rack and tucks away when not in use
Bag Dimensions: Measures 9.6 x 8.2 x 3.3 Inches (LxWxH)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,318 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
